title: Account Missing
body: Ive been trying to log into my Account for 3 days now and it consistanly says invalled username or password and I know for face I'm not typing it in wrong. ive been using this account across many games since team fortress classic. I wasn't smart enough to link it to my email account but I'm still very upset. I haven't spent a large amount of money on the account but loosing 3 years of casual gaming is difficult to want to start over. if you can help it would be appreciated. the account name is LazyStooner.

replies.body: Are you connected to the correct region in the patch, located on the top right?  It should say North America, but if not you can select and it change it pretty instantly.  Hopefully, this is all it was but let me know!
I just retried on both my computers and made sure it was on north America as well as made sure caps lock wasn't on or num lock on.

Thanks for the update!  I suggest going over to our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide to help locate your account.  If you still have any issues, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our account team can help out.  No worries, we'll help find it!
I have tried both but due to the face I didn't link it with my email I cant complete ither form.
